description: A man in a lab coat attends to a strapped human-like figure on a table, while a large ape is confined in a cage nearby. At the top of the stairs, a woman announces the arrival of guests who wish to view the "ape-man project". This bizarre scene blends domestic life with unsettling scientific experimentation. The casual display of a potentially unethical experiment to social visitors creates a deeply absurd situation. This highlights a surreal intersection of social convention and monstrous scientific endeavor.
caption: "Honey, the Merrimonts are here. ... They'd like to come down and see your ape-man project."
